response.overview: Tension erupts in a boarding house when Bu Mampang (50), the landlady, discovers human feces left unflushed in the bathroom. She gathers all the tenants to uncover the culprit, turning the house into a scene of accusations and suspicion. Amid the chaos, Vira (22) tries to uncover the truth from CCTV footage, but Bu Mampang refuses, citing a mysterious excuse. When the truth finally surfaces, Vira discovers a dark secret hidden behind the place she once called home.
response.title: Kuwi Nggonku
